bibl.title: P. Oxy. LIII 3705: A Line from Menander's 'Periceiromene' with Musical Notations.
bibl.note: The iambic trimeter in P. Oxy. LIII, 3705 is to be identified with MENANDER, Pk. 796. There is no convincing argument against the assumption that this fragment gives evidence of a practice of setting selections of Menandrean dialogue to music.
HUYS Marc, P. Oxy. LIII 3705: A Line from Menander's 'Periceiromene' with Musical Notations.
